title: Zarif issues message of condolence on martyrdom of Brig. Gen. Hamedani (Ministry of Foreign Affairs ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs of IR of Iran ) Foreign Minister Mohammad-Javad Zarif in a message on Friday condoled Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Froces and Commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps ( IRGC ) and the bereaved
